title: Noxus Poppy
body: So not to long ago i seen a short video on a Noxus Poppy skin....and i was wondering if there is anyways to still get the skin......maybe through hextech or any other way?

replies.body: oh well thats cool thanks guys for the help!

*Zombiemaster* is spot on with their assessment of the situation. Hextech crafting is a great way to get some of the awesome legacy skins that only see limited availability. To supplement the information they've provided, you can find more information about these skins inside our [Guide to Legacy/Limited Skins.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)

Let me know if you have any additional questions.

Yes, it is possible to get this skin through Hextech Crafting or through mystery gifts. Also, since it is a legacy skin, it can come back to the store when Riot decides to open the legacy vault again, but there are no news on when Riot will do this.
